# isOpen()

**Instance Method**

Returns the state of the channel.

## Declaration

```swift
func isOpen() -> Bool
```

## Return Value

TRUE if the channel state is open, FALSE otherwise.

## Discussion

note that “not open” means closed, opening and closing.
title: isOpen()
